name: Atelier Sophie: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Book DX
overview: The 1st instalment in this role-playing series, "Atelier Sophie", is back in DX form! The Mysterious series combines heart-warming everyday elements with extraordinary experiences in a world full of wonders. As a fledgling alchemist, Sophie works with Plachta on various alchemic recipes in order to hone her skills. As they learns new recipes, explore the fields, collect materials, and synthesize new items, the power of alchemy and Plachta's memories begin to come to life. What makes it DX: • New episodes of Sophie's growth and a new costume that will help her follow in her grandmother's steps! • Three new cauldrons to assist in your adventures! • Sprinting option to make getting around a lot easier! • 'Fast Forward' feature for fast-paced battles! • Lots of previously released DLC! • Photo mode to enjoy capturing beautiful images!
